name: Water Gun: Pool Party Shooter
description:
Water Gun : Pool Party Shooter is amazing FPS game where in you are in a farm house with a water gun to shoot water on your friends and have fun.

In this game you are equipped with a water gun and you have to shoot water at your friends and make your friends completely wet with water. They will get annoyed if you continuously smash them with water gun, so be aware of that.

You are given with 4 different water gun which will be unlocked as the level progress.

So complete the achievements and enjoy water gun game this summer.
